Guided by what works

We combine a pragmatic problem-solving approach with flexible, open-source data science tools like R, Python, Shiny and Quarto to tailor analyses and solutions to the heart of the problem, adding complexity and rigorous statistical considerations as needed.

How we work

We use Posit Connect Cloud to host applications, interactive reports, and other analytical content to make access seamless on any device (all you need is a web link).

Project source code is stored on GitHub to elicit collaboration and provide transparency and ownership over developed solutions.

  • Data science teams are expensive, and many small or midsize businesses don't have resources (or a need) to employ one full time.

  • Having unlimited access to a statistician or data scientist at a low-risk, predictable monthly fee can give you assurance and reduce headaches in those times it is needed, leading to quicker turn around.

  • Staying plugged in through asynchronous communication means we can keep a consistent pulse on your goals, which accelerates alignment on bigger projects.

  • An ongoing relationship elicits active partnership, giving the ability to be proactive and future-oriented, rather than just trying to band-aid immediate solutions.

  • Did we mention the discounted rates?

Meet Alex

A statistician and data scientist in Central Wisconsin, Alex has over a decade of experience learning, teaching, and doing data science work with a wide range of tools, methodologies and problem contexts. Most of his career has been in the healthcare provider sector, both on the research and operational sides. His primary focus is on delivering genuine value through the use of statistics and open-source data science tools, and empowering others to do the same. Want to chat? Shoot him an email!
